title: Nandooruthu Lyrics Nedunchalai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Nandooruthu
Singer(s): Palaniammal, Chinna
Movie: Nedunchalai
Music: C.Sathya
Lyrics: Mani Amuthavan		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Nandooruthu nandooruthu
nari oorudhu nari oorudhu
ennaadhu yedhanadhu yen oru madhiri
aagudhu kaangudhu kadhakadhakudhu
kalavula nilam kodhikudhu
vara vara ennaku paruva kiruku
pudichirukudhu

Yele yele engirukka
innumaale kundhirukka
vaale vaale vambilukka
adhukuthaaney vandhiruken

Radha radha naanthaan radha
unnake unnakkaa naan porandhen
Naatha naatha o-ranga naathaa
kadhal pannen kan thorandhe

aa-ngura oongura yenaangura
Vaangura pongura ennaatha nee sollavara
ovvoru solladhu aayiram solludhada

Che-ngura cho-ngura chingura
sinungura thaa-ngura tho-ngura
edhuku nee thayangura saamiye
kodukura nee adha anubavi da

Moodaadha veedu idhu
mundhaana kaadu idhu
vadaanu koopuduhu oh oh...
Vedonu vendunadhu yengaeyo yengunadhu
ingaeye nirkudhada oh oh oh..

Yele yele engirukka
innumaale kundhirukka
vaale vaale vambilukka
adhukuthaaney vandhiruken

Kaathula kaathula kaathula kaathula
kaathula vasana parakudhu
yenadha yenadha pookalum parapudhu
poothadha poothadha yaarukkum
unarthida thaan thaan thaan...

Kaathadhu Kaathadhu aadayil marachadha
dhevadha azhagula irukudhu
adhu adhu ennakilla
unnakadhu unakadhu thaan

Aaadaadha aattamidhu
aadugira koottam idhu
annanaye saachiputa oh oh ..
Koodaadha kootam idhu..
koothaadum neramidhu
thundu katta thookudhada oh oh oh.

Radha radha naanthaan radha
unnake unnakkaa naan porandhen
Naatha naatha o-ranga naathaa
kadhal pannen kan thorandhe (2) English Translation
